email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $48.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $48.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $49.75 per metric ton? Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $49.75 is acceptable, but could we push the laycan to 18-22 October? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know if these adjustments are feasible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can adjust the laycan to 18-22 October as requested. However, the demurrage rate is non-negotiable at $25,000 per day due to the vessel’s operational costs. If this works for you, I can prepare the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, understood on the demurrage. Let’s proceed with the laycan of 18-22 October and the freight rate of $49.75 per metric ton. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks for your flexibility. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll have the charter party agreement drafted and sent to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to finalizing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
